1.12.2.4.1.0: Abstracted base capabilities into WumpleUtil and switched to using them.
1.12.2.4.0.3: Improvements to stacking by chunking creation time.  Libraries updated.
1.12.2.4.0.1: Fix for strange tooltips on composting items in new worlds with Composter mod
1.12.2.4.0.0: Dimension modifiers - things rot faster in the Nether, and not at all in the End!
1.12.2.3.0.0: Added support for making Entities like MinecartChest and even entity:player as preserving containers.  Negative-preserving containers.  Advancements.  Rotted item and biodegradable item for modpack authors.  Preserving containers refresh items within IItemHandler items.  OreDict usage.  Evaluation interval configurable.
1.12.2.2.1.2: Removed dependency on trove library since latest Forge snapshots remove it.  Some file re-org.
1.12.2.2.1.1: Added cold, frozen, etc tooltips in preserving containers.  Added tooltip text colors.
1.12.2.2.0.6: Mod compat workaround for RotStorage crash
1.12.2.2.0.5: Config support for metadata and ore dictionary
1.12.2.2.0.4: IItemHandler support. Mod compat improvements.  Chinese translation.
1.12.2.2.0.2: Tooltip sync fixes.  Bulk capability container update fix.  More tooltips.
1.12.2.2.0.1: Server crash fixes, optizations, tooltip fixes
1.12.2.2.0.0: Rotting and Preserving now implemented with capabilities.  Any container can be made preserving in config.
1.12.2.1.0.4: Fix dedicated server crash, and added more default config safety
1.12.2.1.0.3: Fixed another config default crash when other mods remove vanilla items
1.12.2.1.0.2: Fixed config default crash when other mods remove vanilla items
1.12.2.1.0.0: Intial version - ported feature from EnviroMine
